name: Scary Toy Factory
description:
Can you survive scary toy factory?

Scary Toy Factory is a horror/puzzle adventure game where you have to survive the vengeful toys waiting for you in an abandoned toy factory. You can use GrabPack to hack electrical circuits or grab objects from afar. Covet the mysterious facility and don't get caught by the mysterious pursuer!


Can you solve all the puzzles and make it out alive this abandoned factory? A vengeful toy is waiting for you inside this maze. Use your powerful Blue Hand and Red Hand to hack electrical circuits or grab anything from afar. Explore the mysterious facility... and don't get caught!

Throughout the game, you need to roam around every room and complete all the fascinating quests to reach the final destination. Don't let the spooky atmosphere scare you away. Try to survive the frightening fluffy somewhere in the factory!

GAME FEATURES:
- Suspenseful gameplay and thrilling quests
- Mind-bending and twisted puzzles
- Intuitive controls
- Amazing graphics and sound effects

Let the fun and horror begin!
